app.component.welcome.welcome.label: Welcome!
app.component.welcome.welcome-text.label: Shelly Home is a practical and free application for Shelly smart home devices. Please select your language to continue.
app.component.welcome.languages.label: Languages
app.component.welcome.creation.label: Who created Shelly Home?
app.component.welcome.creation-text.labe: Shelly Home is a cross platform app created by the software developer Dirk Gausmann. It is developed in his free time and aims to bring a better user experience to Shelly users.
app.component.welcome.features.label: What can Shelly Home do?
app.component.welcome.features-text.labe:
Shelly Home is available on Android, iOS, MacOS and Windows. You can add, manage, update and control your Shelly devices aswell as highly customize how and what information you want to see.
The app also does work without a user account and can directly access the Shelly devices located in the same network. Optionally the user can connect to its Shelly Cloud account, to be able to control the devices from anywhere.
